Real-time Genomic Analysis
iobio uses immediate visual feedback to make understanding complex genomic datasets more intuitive, and analysis more interactive
Try It
  • gene.iobio.io
    a web app for investigating potential disease-causing variants
  • taxonomer.iobio.io
    an ultra fast metagenomics classification and analysis app. Read the blog post

    • Marthlab
    What's Next
    For Users
    We are constantly trying to improve our apps. If our apps are missing something, let us know how we can improve (contact us). Also we are actively building new applications in numerious biological research areas. If you feel iobio would be a good fit for your area of research and would like to collaborate contact us!
    For Developers
    A developers release with be coming out in the next few months so that anyone can build an iobio app. If you want to be informed of the release sign up for updates. More information on developers release
    Developed in the Marth Lab by
    Chase Miller Yi Qiao Tony DiSera Alistair Ward
